title: Upbeat Vocal Pop Music Pack
description: An upbeat vocal pop music pack with 10 unique tracks that is available for licensing.
longDescription:
Click here to listen to the previews.


 Did you know this pack is also included in our Ultimate Cinematic Music Bundle which include all of Epikton's tracks for better value?


A synth-pop music pack with dreamy female vocals that feels relaxing, happy and, daydreaming. With various tempos, drums with big sounding synth chords, and electric bass. Ideal for travel vlogs, intros, product commercials, fashion, party, dance, luxury lifestyle and, tech videos.
technicalDetails:
Tracklist:

  •  Big Sounds (Upbeat Pop Disco Dance Music)
  •  Break Free (Chilling Vocal Pop Beat Jazz Piano)
  •  Colorful Vision (Experimental Fun Party Vocal Pop Music)
  • Glamorous Life (Upbeat Vocal Pop Luxury Lifestyle Electronic)
  • Lazy Train (Upbeat Cheerful Playful Happy Dance Pop Beat)
  • Live Paradise (Chill Relaxing Upbeat Vocal Pop Music)
  • Lullaby Of Spring (Relaxing Vocal Pop Upbeat Chillout Music)
  • Summer Mood (Electronic Party Vocal Pop Dance Music)
  • Sunshine (Upbeat Pop Piano Vocal Happy Positive Corporate)
  • Uplifting The Day (Upbeat Vocal Pop Music Happy Dance Beat)

Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10
